page.title: 15VIEWS OF WARTON RESIDENT 2
page.content: Ranger,Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts and a branch of the British Legion.There are within the village five farms and two small holdings.Four are dairy farms and the others arable.The new { {First School}was opened in 1975 while it was being built an old mortar bomb was found.A Home Gaurd hut once stood on this site.The old school has been renovated and is used for the pre- school{playgroup}many parents felt sad when the 8 year olds were sent to Polesworth.There used to be a Quaker Meeting House in Warton it is now the Warwickshire Morris Minor renovation garage.The outline of Warton has changed with lots of new houses being built.Although the North Sea Gas pipeline passed with 400 yards of the village we are without the {energy}of gas.Coal is our fuel as the village is near the mining{industry}.
